data.title: Barban climate: Average Temperature by month, Barban water temperature
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Barban

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Barban

>>average temperature by month Barban

>>Weather Barban

>>Water temperature Barban

The climate here is considered warm and temperate. In Barban there is a lot of rain even in the driest month. The climate here is classified as Cfa by the Köppen-Geiger. The average temperature in Barban is 13.8 °C | 56.9 °F. The annual rainfall is 1395 mm | 54.9 inch.

The given location is in the northern hemisphere. Summer begins here at the end of June and ends in September. The months of summer are: June, July, August, September. The most popular time to visit is July, August.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Barban

In July, the precipitation level plummets to a mere 60 mm | 2.4 inch. This month holds the title for being exceptionally arid. The greatest amount of precipitation occurs in November, with an average of 211 mm | 8.3 inch.

average temperature by month Barban

The month of highest temperature is July during which the average temperature reaches up to 23.4 °C | 74.2 °F. The lowest average temperatures in the year occur in January, when it is around 5.0 °C | 40.9 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Barban

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The precipitation variance between the months with the lowest and highest levels of rainfall is 151 mm | 6 inch. The variation in temperatures throughout the year is 18.5 °C | 33.2 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is November (76.14 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is July (62.32 percent). The month with the most rainy days is November (14.43 days). The month with the fewest rainy days is July (6.37 days).

Barban weather and climate for every month

Airport close to Barban

The closest Airports of Barban are: Pula Airport (PUY) 20.57km,Rijeka Airport (RJK) 46.43km,Lošinj Airport (LSZ) 62.55km

You can reach Barban from this Cities by Plane: London (STN), Hamburg (HAM), Cologne (CGN), Oslo (RYG), Stockholm (ARN), Frankfurt am Main (FRA), Manchester (MAN), Dublin (DUB), Zagreb (ZAG), Dubrovnik (DBV), Brussels (CRL), Stuttgart (STR), Hahn (HHN), Zadar (ZAD)
